MUSIC.name: Students can enrol in the course; final confirmation will be based on audition/interview during the first week of September.

The Registrar’s Office will add you to this course, once you have met the enrolment condition. This could include being enrolled in a certain program/ year of study, a placement audition, or approval of a proposal.

The course is restricted to students in the specific program/year indicated at all times. Enrolment for others is only an option by obtaining written permission from the instructor of the course. Instructors may require an audition/interview prior to giving permission.

Students enrolled in the specific programs/year indicated will receive priority during the first round of enrolment (July 9-25). During the second round of enrolment, the remaining spaces, if any, will be available to all students.

ARTSC.name: Enrolment via ACORN is not available. Students must request permission to enrol in this course by contacting the sponsoring department
Restricted: Course/section is restricted at all times for specific students.

Restricted: Course/section is restricted at all times for specific students. NOTE: Spaces for each priority group in this course are not equal, and each priority group has its own waitlist until July 23. As of July 25, the waitlists for each priority group merge into one, and your rank on the waitlist may change.

Priority enrolment is given to certain students until July 23. As of July 25 other Arts & Science students can begin to enrol.
